input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISS FEDERAL RAILWAYS SBB, GROUP PURCHASING CONSUMPTION GOODS. Summary: Corund. Description: Corund is used as an abrasive material during sandblasting to clean, smooth or polish the surfaces of the rolling material of the SBB. The provider delivers the products required in the tender in 25kg sacks and/or 1000 kg IBC tanks. The delivery takes place to three locations in Switzerland and the purchasing volume is approximately 180,000 kg/year. <br> Main CPV: 14810000 abrasive. Published Date: 2025-07-31.
